abstract: The House decided not to take up a resolution demanding that Rick Perry apologize for not immediately getting rid of an offensive rock from a ranch his family once leased.
snippet: The House decided not to take up a resolution demanding that Rick Perry apologize for not immediately getting rid of an offensive rock from a ranch his family once leased.
lead_paragraph: The House decided Thursday not to take up a resolution demanding that Gov. Rick Perry of Texas apologize for not immediately getting rid of a rock bearing the word Niggerhead from a ranch his family once leased in Paint Creek, Tex.

headline.main: House Blocks Resolution Demanding Apology From Perry
